product_images.title: NCS Exterior
product_images.description:
This new fanbook includes 252 matt façade colours with page size 50 x 140mm and a further 70 low sheen colours for trim with 5 colours per page. Presented in a sturdy slip case together with an essential Exterior Design Guide and Lightness Table with LRVs and visual lightness.
The colours are a selection from the full range of 1,950 standard NCS colours.

product_images.title: NCS Colour Contrast Kit
product_images.description:
The NCS Colour Contrast Kit makes it easy to create successful colour schemes that comply with legislation and guidelines on access. For the busy professional it can save valuable time. It comprises the NCS Colour Scan and the NCS Index.
The NCS Colour Scan 2.0 gives the NCS reference as well as the LRV of any flat coloured surface, inside or out, and the page number in the NCS Index and NCS Exterior where the colour can be seen. It can be adjusted to read Gloss or Matt surfaces and can store up to 100 readings.

product_images.title: NCS Gloss Scale
product_images.description: A NEW fandeck of greyscale samples for defining and specifying gloss, alone or in combination with colour, compiled in a pocket-sized fan deck 100 x 140mm, useful for professionals who design objects and environments. The samples are white, light and medium grey, and black. For each colour there are seven gloss levels ranging from full matt to high gloss.

product_images.title: NCS Block
product_images.description:
A boxed set of 9 small fanbooks of all 1,950 NCS Original colours. Page size 35 x 105mm. Available in two colour orders: by hue and by nuance. We are pleased to advise on suitability.
Ideal for product design studios or where larger samples are needed for comparison and matching.

product_images.title: NCS Album
product_images.description:
A larger version of the Atlas, presented in two sturdy volumes. Each colour page has pockets with 3 x A9 samples of each colour. 
Ideal for colour design studios where samples are needed for immediate use.

product_images.title: NCS A4 and A6 Sheets
product_images.description:
For presentations, specifications and general colour communication with suppliers and customers. Sheets are printed on the reverse with the NCS notation. All 1,950 colours. 
The difference in perception of a surface with a colour in gloss or matt finish can be considerable. It is advisable to use glossy colour samples for gloss projects. Sheets are printed on the reverse with the NCS notation.

product_images.title: NCS Atlas
product_images.description: The NCS Atlas presents the NCS System most clearly and is the best reference to the 1,950 Original colours for design and architectural offices or libraries. The NCS Atlas includes the NCS Colour Circle and the 40 NCS Colour Triangles which represent the variation of nuance for each point of the NCS Colour Circle. In addition there is a page of pure and tinted greys. The NCS Atlas enables calculation of light reflectance values and colour saturation for all colours and includes a full explanation of the NCS System.

product_images.title: NCS Index
product_images.description:
A well designed fanbook showing all 1,950 NCS colours. The stripe card design allows for edge to edge comparison and has a logical layout which makes colours easy to find.
The new high gloss version of the NCS Index shows all 1,950 colours and allows the effect of high gloss to be considered when selecting colours.

papers_articles.title: Interior colours at the Royal Academy
